Estimate berth lengths

Source: R/estimate-berth_lengths.R
estimate_berth_lengths.Rd

This function estimates berth lengths based on the median travel times across each berth for unimpeded fast trains, with a given total journey time and total track length.

Usage

estimate_berth_lengths(
  timetable_specification,
  id_matching,
  berth_events_groups,
  expected_journey_time,
  track_length
)

Arguments

timetable_specification

Timetable specification

id_matching

Id matching

berth_events_groups

Berth events groups

expected_journey_time

Expected journey time in seconds from start of Centrix track to end

track_length

Total length of Centrix track in miles

Value

Berth lengths and median travel times. A data frame with 6 columns:

  • berthBerth ID

  • median_travelMedian travel time for fast trains across that berth

  • v.mphExpected speed for fast trains across that berth

  • L.milesEstimated berth length in miles

  • L.kmEstimated berth length in kilometres

  • LEstimated berth length in metres

See also

calculate_journey_specifications() match_ids() cluster_journeys() estimate_dwell_times() berth_lengths

Examples

data(timetable_specification, id_matching, berth_events_groups)
